commit.message: Merge branch 'JDK-8350813' of https://github.com/azuev-java/jdk into JDK-8350813

Update test/jdk/javax/sound/midi/BulkSoundBank/BulkSoundBank.java

Use try with resources clause in the test.

Co-authored-by: Harshitha Onkar <harshitha.onkar@oracle.com>
Add a treshold of 90% to avoid OOME because of the additional buffers needed to process sound bank.
